headers.subject: [tosdr:2891] Gittip: [Info] Changes to the site without notification

subject: Gittip: [Info] Changes to the site without notification
text:
Title: [Info] Changes to the site without notification
Topic: changes-notice
Summary: Gittip may not notify users of an impending change. However, given Gittip's open development model, users who wish to monitor for changes can actively do so.
Score: 0

> Gittip reserves the right to modify or discontinue, temporarily or permanently, the Site or any features or portions thereof without prior notice. 

Discussion:

Any site generally changes without notification, so I'm not certain how important it is to list this. However, features from time to time do go away, and users would likely want to be notified directly about it.

Note: This is a part of the series of ratings as a part of gittip issue #1898.

https://github.com/gittip/www.gittip.com/issues/1898

References:

Gittip Terms of Service 

https://www.gittip.com/about/terms/

Gittip Privacy Policy

https://www.gittip.com/about/privacy/
